content: {A想象}Oh, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, just a moment. While you've been busy, I've been keeping an eye on how our Neighbors are doing.

content: <style=Highlight>Yunguo</style> always seems to be busy farming... She hasn't gotten any furniture for herself, nor has she decorated her home at all.

content: Perhaps she's just too busy and is reluctant to trouble others for help...

content: {A灵光一现}Hoho! <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, when you have time, why don't you ask <style=Highlight>Yunguo for her thoughts</style>? I'm sure that would help her a good deal.
